text: I am pleased to be speaking at the opening ceremony of the HPAIR 2016 #Harvard Conference today to discuss events transpiring in the MENA
I am delighted to speak today at the opening ceremony of the Harvard Conference for Asia and International Relations to discuss events in the Middle East and their implications
Events currently playing out in the Middle East and North Africa have global consequences of deep geo-strategic significance
The events taking place in the Middle East and North Africa region are serious events with a deep geo-strategic dimension and have international implications
How do we awaken & channel the liberal & #democratic spirit of the #Arab people & evolve towards internal cohesion & prosperous #coexistence
The need to awaken and guide the spirit of the Arab people; and to motivate countries to consolidate Arab nationalism, internal cohesion and prosperous coexistence
How do we reach the destination of a shared security and overall prosperity for the #Arab people without decades of internecine conflict
How can we achieve the common security of the Arab people without decades of internal conflicts?
Five years since Bouazizi's self-immolation; the Arab World is still struggling to find its way # HPAIR2016
Five years have passed since Bouazizi set fire to himself and the Arab world is still struggling to find its way
What constituents robust nation states is sovereignty built on citizenship & a deep conviction in shared civic values ​​& social norms #HPAIR
The essence of truth is that it forms the basis of strong nation states; sovereignty based on citizenship and firm conviction in common civic values ​​and social norms
Instead of the binding glue of citizenship & civic capital, groups such as #Daesh fill this void with the corrosive acid of intimidation
Instead of working to increase the cohesion between citizenship and civil capital; groups such as a lobbyist come to fill this void with terror
There will never be real stability in the region without the settlement of the # Palestinian- # Israeli conflict #HPAIR # HPAIR2016
There will be no stability in the region without the settlement of the Palestinian cause and the establishment of an independent Palestinian state in the territories occupied by Israel
The gradual march toward a stable, democratic system of gov't was disrupted by the creation of #Israel and the layout of #Palestinians
The gradual development of a stable and democratic regime in the region has been disrupted by the establishment of the State of Israel and the suffering of the Palestinian people
We can not hope to curtail ongoing sectarian violence without and until we create pathways to prosperity for young #Arabs # HPAIR2016
We can not reduce the ongoing sectarian violence unless we create paths to prosperity for young Arabs. "Arabs are more attractive than the offers offered to them by militant groups
HM King Abdullah II took advantage of the momentum created by our #Jordan Spring to expedite the political reforms he had already started
His Majesty King Abdullah II took advantage of the momentum in the region to accelerate the political reforms in Jordan that he had already begun
#Jordanians are resilient & contributed more than their fair share to help the #Syrian refugees who select 20% of the population #HPAIR
The Jordanian people are Saber and have contributed more than their fair share to help the Syrian refugees, who now make up 20% of Jordan's population. This has caused them hardship
The Margaret Mahy Family Playground in Christchurch is impressive. Lovely to see lots of families having fun there. https://t.co/enUZ7OJoTT
HM King Abdullah II added that #Jordan will continue to help, but not at the expense of the welfare of its citizens # HPAIR2016
His Majesty King Abdullah II affirmed that Jordan will continue to do what is right. But not at the expense of citizens # Jordanians.
We must design home-grown, globally competitive, socially compassionate & fiscally sustainable philosophy of prosperity across the #MENA
We must design and establish a new philosophy in the Middle East that is internally, globally competitive, compassionate and socially and financially sustainable.
We need, as many others have already called for, a regional "Marshall Plan" to help reboot the economies in the #MENA region # HPAIR2016
As many others have called for, we need a regional Marshall Plan to help re-stimulate the economies of the # Middle East region
We must enable #Arab leaders to come down from the tightrope & build a pathway to prosperity for the region's 70 million young people.
We must begin to remove the fog of war and enable Arab leaders to pass the difficult stage and build the road to the prosperity of the 70 million young people in the region
The #Arab World would do well to learn from the experience of both East Asia, including China, and the Scandinavian social welfare model
The # Arab world must learn from the experience of both East Asia, including China, and the Scandinavian model of social welfare
The challenges of combating #terrorism & the increasing volatile environments are no longer local issues; but fluidly transcend borders
The challenges of countering terrorism and extremism, and the growing political, social and economic environments that are volatile, are no longer local; they have become transboundary
Many long vacation wks, how do you leave? I wish to return brtolak day 2, drive carefully. I hope survived prayer, God willing,
Der er ikke noget valg mellem forsvar og dialog. To ensure long term stability in Europe we need both and today we need more of both. # MSC2016
10 years later, I think with a still alive pain to #IlanHalimi and his relatives. The fight against anti-Semitism must bring us together. -Serial

I am now going to Rio, and I participate, in the West Zone, of the National Day of Mobilization #ZikaZero
President, governors, mayors, ministers we will personally alert and guide the population (...)
(...) on the fight against the mosquito that transmits the virus of zika, dengue and chikungunya. #ZikaZero
We will show how simple actions, avoiding the presence of standing water, can prevent the birth of the mosquito. #ZikaZero
Stopping all mosquito breeding is essential especially in homes, where 2/3 of mosquitoes are. Do your part! #ZikaZero
We should also stop the breeding grounds in public areas. #ZikaZero
Follow the coverage of this Mobilization Day activities at https://t.co/PbX8CqtLoB #ZikaZero
Munich Security Conference https://t.co/OFa6CYr6Kg https://t.co/GGLr8YR6x2
I consider it unacceptable that dialogue on the future of Euro-Atlantic security in many areas has almost ceased https://t.co/OFa6CYr6Kg
We are rapidly rolling into a new cold war exactly at a time when cooperation is paramount https://t.co/OFa6CYr6Kg https://t.co/x77fQlmNo8
Sustainable economic development, inequality, poverty, unheard-of migration, new forms of terrorism, conflicts are the real challenges today
The way of sanctions and confrontation is a road to nowhere https://t.co/OFa6CYr6Kg https://t.co/fjNoMGiZZ0
If we fail to normalise the situation in Syria and other conflict areas, terrorism will become a new form of war practiced worldwide
The refugee problem poses a real danger to common economic space, cultural space and even European identity proper https://t.co/OFa6CYr6Kg
Can we unite in order to stand up against the challenges we face? Yes, I am absolutely sure that we can https://t.co/SzvcMgfLMk
